description: saucer-shaped, with cloth hanging down around edges; beaded chin strap with cross designs; tassels on crown and chin strap with grey and brown hair and multicolored beads; large black square with white cross and zigzag edging on crown; red, white and black fabrics and beads on fringe and chin strap
dimension: 4 x 18 1/4 x 18 1/4 in. (10.16 x 46.36 x 46.36 cm) (saucer/crown portion only)
title: Woman's hat
